ValidationRule.description: Insures that Business/ Industry is adequately populated before close
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Won") && ISPICKVAL(Account.Business_Industry__c, "Not Yet Known,") && CloseDate > DATE(2017,1,9) && Owner.UserRole.Name = "Retirement Plan Consultant"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Business/Industry Field must be adequately populated to close out this opportunity. "Not Yet Known" is not acceptable at this stage.
